response.name: getDetail
response.body:
{
    "utilityCode": "WASA_GENERAL-BILL",
    "utilityTitle": "WASA",
    "utilityImage": "http://api.sslwireless.com/uploads/utility_logo/wasa.png",
    "flow": "1",
    "fieldItemList": [
        {
            "key": "account_no",
            "label": "Account number",
            "fieldType": "text",
            "dataType": "text",
            "regex": "[a-zA-Z_0-9]{1,30}",
            "hint": "E.g. xxxxxxxxx",
            "options": null,
            "required": true
        },
        {
            "key": "billno",
            "label": "Bill Number",
            "fieldType": "text",
            "dataType": "numeric",
            "regex": "^(?:\\+?88|0088)?01[15-9]\\d{8}$",
            "hint": "E.g. xxxxxxxxx",
            "options": null,
            "required": true
        }
    ]
}
